title: Jonathan Coulton's Brand New Portal Song Is a Fantastic Companion to "Still Alive"
content: Who doesn’t love Jonathan Coulton’s contributions to the Portal games? They’re fantastic, entertaining songs, and he’s just written another one. You Wouldn’t Know was written for Lego Dimensions, and pairs Coulton up again with GLaDOS voice actor Ellen McLain. Compared to the last couple of songs, this one is quite a bit happier. Advertisement It’s a fun song, and it fits together up nicely with the other two songs. While we’re at it, listen to the others, recorded live in 2014: [Mashable, via BoingBoing]
